definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: This paper deals with the development of the embryo, endosperm, seed coat and pericarp of Humulus scandens(Lour. )Merr. with the light microscope.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用光学显微镜对葎草的胚后发育进行了研究。

sentences.english: I used up my money decorating my new house.
sentences.chinese: 我装修新房子时用光了手头的钱。

sentences.english: The contact and the gas valve are controlled by phototriac and triac.
sentences.chinese: 用光耦和双向晶闸管控制接触器和电磁阀。

sentences.english: It's nicer now with the slicks but there's still a lot to learn.
sentences.chinese: 而现在用光头胎很棒，但是还有很多东西要去学。

sentences.english: But first, these cells must somehow learn how to use light as an input source.
sentences.chinese: 但首先，这些细胞得知道怎么利用光作为输入源。

sentences.english: The floor wax has been used out; please buy some for me.
sentences.chinese: 地板蜡用光了，请帮我买一些。

sentences.english: He used up all your savings and now he's gone.
sentences.chinese: 他用光了你的积蓄，连个人影儿都找不到了。

sentences.english: The photoelastic method and the speckle technique are sued for measuring the stress and displacement field respectively.
sentences.chinese: 分别用光弹法及散斑法测出试件的应力场及位移场。

sentences.english: He cut off Windu's weapon hand with his lightsaber.
sentences.chinese: 他用光剑砍掉温杜握剑的手。

sentences.english: They have used up all the money and they have to beg.
sentences.chinese: 他们用光了所有的钱，只好去行乞。

sentences.english: We ran out of coal,and had to burn wood.
sentences.chinese: 我们的煤用光了，只好烧柴。

sentences.english: Flash your light around and see if anyone is hiding in here.
sentences.chinese: 你用光四处照一下，看看这里是否藏着人。

sentences.english: And if it runs out I can stop at a drug-store.
sentences.chinese: 如果用光了，我可以找一个药房停下来。

sentences.english: A few of the jeeps had run out of ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 几辆吉普车上的弹药已经用光了。

sentences.english: And their philosophy is " I know I how to earn money when I know how to spend money".
sentences.chinese: 他们的格言是“能花才更能赚”，花光用光自得其乐。

sentences.english: and then I'm calling up and I'm, meanwhile I'm running out of money.
sentences.chinese: 然后我不停地打电话，同时，我的钱也慢慢地用光了。

definition: to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
to put to good use/to come in handy
to save bit by bit/to accumulate
to collect all the bits to make a whole
almost/nearing completion/bits and piece/of all kinds
to make up for what is lacking/to fill (a vacancy)/to replenish
